attributes.action: Allow 15-18yr olds to give our input directly on decisions that affect our live
attributes.additional_details: Most of the decisions made affect us personally and people like me are very much into these issues and why these are more important than other ones in our country.
attributes.background: Rishi is making all these promises on education when in reality we should be focusing on our economy that was broken down by Liz Truss, let parliament allow us to give our opinion on these decisions without them being outcasted or forgotten .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you would like 15-18 year olds to have say in how the country is run, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following petitions on a similar issue:

Lower the voting age to 15:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/645547

Lower the voting age to 16:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642894
